snippet: Delta Air Lines Inc on Monday cut its operating margin forecast for the current quarter, citing higher costs, and said it expected passenger unit revenue, a closely watched revenue metric, to be at the lower end of its forecast....

headline.main: Berlin's Long-Delayed Airport Gets New Boss
headline.print_headline: Berlin's Long-Delayed Airport Gets New Boss

lead_paragraph: Delta Air Lines Inc on Monday cut its operating margin forecast for the current quarter, citing higher costs, and said it expected passenger unit revenue, a closely watched revenue metric, to be at the lower end of its forecast.
